skills.name: Colossal Smash
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Innate:}} Every few seconds, {{cis|Galio}} next basic attack deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} in an area, increased based on his {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resist}}}}.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Galio's''' next [[basic attack]] has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}} and is modified to deal {{pp|15 to 200|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' magic resistance)}} {{as|magic damage}} to the target and all enemies near them.
''Colossal Smash'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, dealing {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to all targets hit.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Galio's next basic attack has an uncancelable windup and is modified to deal 15undefined âˆ’ 200undefined (based on level) (+ 100% AD) (+ 50% AP) (+ 60% bonus magic resistance) magic damage to the target and all enemies near them.
Colossal Smash can critically strike, dealing (+ IE 25%) AD bonus magic damage to all targets hit.

skills.name: Winds of War
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Galio}} fires two windblasts that converge to the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
Upon converging, the blasts form a tornado that continually deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within, based on each {{as|target's '''maximum''' health}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' creates two windblasts 250 units to either side of him that arc out before converging to the target area, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies they pass through.

When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds and slowly moves forward, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds to enemies within the area, with the target's health ratio capped at 150 damage against {{tip|monsters}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Galio creates two windblasts 250 units to either side of him that arc out before converging to the target area, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through.
When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds and slowly moves forward, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within the area, with the target's health ratio capped at 150 damage against monsters.
leveling: {{st|Tornado Magic Damage Per Tick|{{as|2% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.66%}} per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Total Tornado Magic Damage|{{as|8% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.64}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
skills.notes:
* Deals {{tip|area damage}} on the gust and applies {{tip|persistent area damage}} for the tornado. 
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the gusts damage but not the tornado's.
* {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} can block each windblast individually.
** The tornado will not form if only one windblast reaches the target location.
* ''Winds of War'' will fire from wherever '''Galio''' is at the end of the cast time.

skills.name: Shield of Durand
skills.effect_radius: {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{pp|type=channel time|175 to 350 for 9|0 to 2|formula=175+(21.875 per 0.25 seconds channeled).}}
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Passive:}} After not taking damage for some time, {{ci|Galio}} gains a shield that absorbs {{as|magic damage}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' {{tip|channel|charges up}} a defensive stance, moving {{tip|slow|slowly}} while gaining {{tip|damage reduction}}.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Upon learning ''Shield of Durand'' or after not taking damage for 12 seconds, '''Galio''' gains ''Anti-Magic Bulwark''.
{{sbc|Anti-Magic Bulwark:}} Gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{as|magic damage}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to 3 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} himself by 15%, and gaining {{as|magic damage}} {{tip|Damage reduction|reduction}} and half of that amount as {{as|physical damage}} reduction; charging increases ''Shield of Durand's'' radius, damage and {{tip|taunt}} duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel. ''Shield of Durand'' can be recast at any time within its duration. If '''Galio''' finishes charging or is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, he automatically initiates the recast.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Galio''' refreshes the [[damage modifier|damage reduction]] for 2 seconds and deals {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}, increased by {{pp|type=channel time|key=%|0 to 200 for 9|0 to 2|formula=100%+(25% per 0.25 seconds channeled).}}, and {{tip|taunt|taunts}} them and sets their {{sti|ms|{{as|movement speed}}}} to a {{as|static 60|ms}} for {{pp|type=channel time|0.5 to 1.5 for 9|0 to 2|formula=0.5+(0.125 per 0.25 seconds channeled).}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Upon learning Shield of Durand or after not taking damage for 12 seconds, Galio gains Anti-Magic Bulwark.
Anti-Magic Bulwark: Gain a shield that absorbs magic damage.
Active: Galio charges for up to 3 seconds, slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction; charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and taunt duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel. Shield of Durand can be recast at any time within its duration. If Galio finishes charging or is interrupted, he automatically initiates the recast.
Recast: Galio refreshes the damage modifier for 2 seconds and deals magic damage to nearby enemy champions, increased by 0 to 2 â€’ undefined, and taunts them and sets their movement speed to a static 60 for 0 to 2 â€’ undefined seconds.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Reduction|{{ap|20 to 40}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}} {{as|(+ 8% per 100 '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}{{st|Physical Damage Reduction|{{ap|10 to 20}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} {{as|(+ 4% per 100 '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}
{{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 80}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 80*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* '''Galio''' is {{tip|lockout|locked out}} of attacking and casting for {{fd|0.4}} seconds after recasting.
** '''Galio''' may still buffer his actions during this time.
* ''Static movement speed'' cannot be modified by {{sti|movement speed|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} or {{tip|slow resist}}.
** This effect is negated only if the target is {{tip|slow-immune}}.
* The ability key does not need to be held down when buffered in other abilities except from {{ai|Winds of War|Galio}}.

skills.name: Justice Punch
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Galio}} will briefly {{tip|lunge|step}} back and {{tip|dash|charge}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} enemies he passes through. He will stop upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' {{tip|lunge|steps}} backwards in the opposite direction and, after the cast time, he {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location, though not through terrain, until he collides with an enemy champion.
'''Galio''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit in his path, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Galio steps backwards in the opposite direction and, after the cast time, he dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, until he collides with an enemy champion.
Galio deals magic damage to all enemies hit in his path, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and knocks them up for 0.75 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Champion Magic Damage|{{ap|90 to 250}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Non-Champion Magic Damage|{{ap|90/2 to 250/2}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* '''Galio''' can cast movement effects during the ability, and buffers all other active effects.
* '''Galio''' will initiate the {{tip|dash}} even if his step backwards is {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}}.
* '''Galio's''' second dash will always dash the distance of the target direction. Having the step backwards cut short has no effect on the total distance gained.

effects.str:
• Champion Magic Damage: (+ 90% AP)
  • Non-Champion Magic Damage: (+ 45% AP)

skills.name: Hero's Entrance
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Galio}} guards the target allied champion, granting his {{ai|Shield of Durand|Galio|shield}} to himself and all allied champions in the area.
After a delay, '''Galio''' rises then smashes down onto the ally's original location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' designates the target allied {{tip|champion|champion's}} location at the time of cast as his landing spot, resetting {{ais|Shield of Durand 2|Galio|Shield of Durand}} passive magic {{tip|shield}} for himself and additionally granting it to all allied champions in the area he casted it at for 5 seconds, and {{tip|channels}} for {{fd|2.75}} seconds.

After channeling for {{fd|1.25}} seconds, '''Galio''' gains {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immunity}} for the remaining duration and becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, then leaps into the air for {{tt|{{fd|0.85 seconds}}|Estimated}} before {{tip|dash|dashing}} to the location over {{tt|{{fd|0.25 seconds}}|Estimated}}, after which he lands and becomes targetable again, standing in place for {{tt|{{fd|0.4 seconds}}|Estimated}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact as well as {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} 100 units over {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Galio designates the target allied champion's location at the time of cast as his landing spot, resetting Galio's Shield of Durand 2 passive magic shield for himself and additionally granting it to all allied champions in the area he casted it at for 5 seconds, and channels for 2.75 seconds.
After channeling for 1.25 seconds, Galio gains crowd control immunity for the remaining duration and becomes untargetable, then leaps into the air for 0.85 seconds before dashing to the location over 0.25 seconds, after which he lands and becomes targetable again, standing in place for 0.4 seconds and dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact as well as knocking them back 100 units over 0.75 seconds.
skills.notes:
* ''Hero's Entrance'' does not resist allied {{tip|crowd control}}.
* '''Galio''' cannot cast ''Hero's Entrance'' on allies he cannot {{tip|sight|see}} while {{tip|Nearsight|nearsighted}}.
* '''Galio''' will still cause an impact to occur at the destination even if he is unable to travel the full distance with the dash (e.g. by {{ais|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}} and {{ais|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}} borders and terrain). '''Galio''' will dash as far as he can go, and thus, does not end the dash prematurely.
* '''Galio''' will always dash 100 units minimum, and dash ''over'' his target's location if they are less than 100 units away from him.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Galio''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|cast=false|move=false|items=false, true|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=death, root, silence, ground}}
* ''Hero's Entrance's'' channel can only be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}} in the first {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
